summary: This is an email chain from July 30, 2008, between defense attorney Roy Black and an Assistant U.S. Attorney regarding scheduling a call to discuss the Jeffrey Epstein case, specifically the performance of the criminal Non-Prosecution Agreement.

persons.name: Roy Black
persons.context: He is the recipient and sender of emails, coordinating a call with a federal prosecutor to discuss the Jeffrey Epstein matter. He states he is out of town in California and the mountains.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email chain and the matter to be discussed, specifically regarding the performance of his criminal Non-Prosecution Agreement.

connections.description: Roy Black is communicating with a federal prosecutor about the Epstein case, indicating he is acting as Epstein's defense attorney.

events.title: Scheduled call about Epstein NPA
events.description: An Assistant U.S. Attorney and defense attorney Roy Black schedule a phone call for the afternoon to discuss the performance of Jeffrey Epstein's criminal Non-Prosecution Agreement.

locations: 500 S. Australian Ave, Suite 400 West Palm Beach, FL 33401
keyFacts: The communication is between defense attorney Roy Black and a federal prosecutor in July 2008.
The subject is Jeffrey Epstein and specifically the 'performance of the criminal Non-Prosecution Agreement'.
Roy Black was out of town in California and the mountains, coordinating a time for the call.
The prosecutor's office was located in West Palm Beach, Florida.
